name: LoopHoles (SnazzyMcSnaz)
description:
Bring your cheese down the endless hole to solve puzzles. That's about it :)

This is the first game that I've ever "completed",  and to be honest it is quite janky. There are a few issues with it, but this was just for the game-jam, so I'm okay with that. If anyone actually plays this, I might come back to de-jankify it. To anyone who played it, thank you so so much. But whatever you do, please do not stack the cheese. 

Controls:

Arrow Keys: move and jump

Z: Pick Up/Interact

X: Drop

Thanks to:

Lina, Andrew, Yabby, Caleb, and everyone else who helped me test it. You're probably the only reason why this game is actually playable

And you, whoever's reading this. Thank you so much.
